sentences.en: ...a bright morning in mid-December.
sentences.cn: …12月中旬一个晴朗的早晨。

sentences.en: Barry resigned his directorship in December 1973.
sentences.cn: 巴里于1973年12月辞去了他的董事之职。

sentences.en: By December last year most of the resources had been spoken for.
sentences.cn: 去年12月之前，绝大多数的资源就被预订了。

sentences.en: Four years of negotiation ended fruitlessly last December.
sentences.cn: 历时4年的谈判在去年12月无果而终。

sentences.en: From September until December, Congress remained in session.
sentences.cn: 从9月到12月，国会一直都在开会。

sentences.en: Her baby was born on 4th December.
sentences.cn: 她的孩子是12月4号出生的。

sentences.en: Her political career came to a halt in December 1988.
sentences.cn: 她的政治生涯于1988年12月画上了句号。

sentences.en: I keep forgetting it's December.
sentences.cn: 我总是忘了现在是12月了。

sentences.en: I send out Valentine’s cards with the girls’ photo, instead of trying to mail cards in December.
sentences.cn: ——我寄出有女孩子照片的情人节贺卡，以代替试图在十二月寄出的贺卡。

sentences.en: In the dark of December.
sentences.cn: 在十二月的黑夜里。

sentences.en: In winter, there are December, January and.
sentences.cn: 在冬季，有十二月，一月和二月。 。

sentences.en: Jake’s birthday is on December 6th.
sentences.cn: 杰克的生日是12月6日。

sentences.en: Last December they hunted down and killed one of the gangsters.
sentences.cn: 去年12月他们追捕到其中一名匪徒并将其击毙。

sentences.en: Last December they visited Prague.
sentences.cn: 去年12月他们去了布拉格。

sentences.en: My birthday is in December.
sentences.cn: 我的生日是在十二月。

sentences.en: Our summers are short and our winters long.In December, when it is darkest, we only have a few hours of very weak sunlight per day.
sentences.cn: 我们的夏天很短但是冬天很长，在十二月，也就是最黑的时候，我们的一天中只有很短的时间可以看到微弱的阳光。

sentences.en: She looked back now to that fateful day in December.
sentences.cn: 她现在回顾十二月里那决定性的一天。

sentences.en: The bank celebrates its hundredth anniversary in December.
sentences.cn: 这家银行将于12月庆祝其成立100周年。

sentences.en: The closing date for entries is 31st December.
sentences.cn: 提交参赛作品的截止日期是12月31日。

sentences.en: The rainy season in the Andes normally starts in December.
sentences.cn: 安第斯山区的雨季通常在12月份来临。

sentences.en: The sides must battle again for a quarter-final place on December 16.
sentences.cn: 双方将在12月16日再次交锋以争夺进入四分之一决赛的席位。

sentences.en: The trees were damaged by a freeze in December.
sentences.cn: 那些树因为12月里的一次冰冻而遭到毁坏。

sentences.en: There will be a run-off between these two candidates on December 9th.
sentences.cn: 12月9日将举行这两位候选人的决胜选举。

sentences.en: This is me at school in December.
sentences.cn: 这就是十二月在学校中的我。

sentences.en: We got married in December.
sentences.cn: 我们是12月份结婚的。

trans.tran_en: the 12th month of the year, between November and January
the 12th month of the year, between November and January
